title: The "Awwww!" Continues
author: JGray
text:
The script for the next short story, staring "the Hacker" and "the Sniper" is finished and in Keith's hands to illustrate. It accomplished everything I had hoped for.

1. It gives two characters who have only had a handful of panels a central role in their own story.

2. It returns to a location we've previously visited as a comic.

3. It provides more insight into an important plot point and an even which was mentioned in chapter 6.

4. It has the longest and most kick-ass action sequence the comic has had yet. Not GrrlPower super power brawl in the parking lot long but long.

I'm looking forward to sharing it with you all!

See you Thursday!

replies.author: Aleena*Guest*
replies.text: I'm very much looking forward to it

replies.author: Gunsolo*Guest*
replies.text:
And we are all looking forward to seeing it.
Almost as excited as Chrys in panel 5

replies.author: Xade*Guest*
replies.text: awe, so adorable, I love how you quickly get the point across on what they are saying.
